context.DELIVERY ADDRESS: FOUR SEVEN ZERO TWO RANDALL DRIVE

summary: Wonderful, I've got the order placed for a medium Hawaiian pizza to be delivered to 4702 Randall Drive in the next 30 minutes. Thank you for your order, I appreciate your business. Have a great rest of your day!

transcript.content: Hello, this is [Assistant's name] calling on behalf of a customer. I'd like to place an order for a Hawaiian pizza to be delivered to 4702 Randall Drive. What size and any other details would you need for the order?
Yeah, what size do you need?
A medium Hawaiian pizza, please. What time would be best for the delivery?
Ah, yeah, I'm good to you like 30 minutes.
Okay, great. I'll have a medium Hawaiian pizza delivered to 4702 Randall Drive within the next 30 minutes. Is there anything else I can get for you today?
Um, that you can get from me.

Wonderful, I've got the order placed for a medium Hawaiian pizza to be delivered to 4702 Randall Drive in the next 30 minutes. Thank you for your order, I appreciate your business. Have a great rest of your day!
